sen.j: 名神大社（みょうじんたいしゃ）とは、古来より霊験が著しいとされる名神を祀る神社である。
sen.e: Myojin Taisha are shrines that enshrine gods known as Myojin that are considered to have had especially remarkable miraculous effects since ancient times.
Myojin Taisha are shrines that enshrine gods known as Myojin that are considered to have had especially remarkable miraculous effects since ancient times.
Myojin Taisha are shrines that enshrine gods known as Myojin that are considered to have had especially remarkable miraculous effects since ancient times.

sen.j: 全てが古代社格制度における大社（官幣大社・国幣大社）に列しているので、「名神大社」と呼ばれる。
sen.e: They are named "Myojin Taisha" because all such shrines were ranked as Taisha (Kanpei Taisha and Kokuhei Taisha) under the ancient shrine classification system.
They are named "Myojin Taisha" because all such shrines were ranked as Taisha (Kanpei Taisha and Kokuhei Taisha) under the ancient shrine classification system.
They are named 'Myojin Taisha' because all such shrines were ranked as Taisha (Kanpei Taisha and Kokuhei Taisha) under the ancient shrine classification system.

sen.j: 名神大（みょうじんだい）とも記される。
sen.e: These shrines are also referred to as Myojindai.
These shrines are also referred to as Myojindai.
These shrines are also referred to as Myojindai.

sen.j: 『延喜式』巻八・九の延喜式神名帳に記載される神社（式内社）2861社3132座のうち、名神大社は224社310座である。
sen.e: The Jinmyocho (Register of Deities) comprising volumes 8 and 9 of the "Engishiki" (Procedures of the Engi Era) lists 2861 shrines (shikinaisha) and 3132 deities, and of these, 224 shrines and 310 deities are classified as Myojin Taisha.

The Jinmyocho (Register of Deities) comprising volumes 8 and 9 of the "Engishiki" (Procedures of the Engi Era) lists 2861 shrines (shikinaisha) and 3132 deities, and of these, 224 shrines and 310 deities are classified as Myojin Taisha.

The Jinmyocho (Register of Deities) comprising volumes 8 and 9 of the "Engishiki" (Procedures of the Engi Era) lists 2861 shrines (shikinaisha) and 3132 deities, and of these, 224 shrines and 310 deities are classified as Myojin Taisha.

sen.j: しかし、巻三（臨時祭）に臨時祭にあずかる神社として記載されているのは203社285座で、神名帳にあって臨時祭にない社が21社ある。
sen.e: Volume 3 (Rinji-sai) lists 203 shrines and 285 deities at which special festivals were held, which means that there are 21 shrines listed in the Jinmyocho volumes but not in this volume.
Volume 3 (Rinji-sai) lists 203 shrines and 285 deities at which special festivals were held, which means that there are 21 shrines listed in the Jinmyocho volumes but not in this volume.
Volume 3 (Rinji-sai) lists 203 shrines and 285 deities at which special festivals were held, which means that there are 21 shrines listed in the Jinmyocho volumes but not in this volume.

sen.j: このずれについては、神名帳と臨時祭の管轄が違うためとする説や、名神大社に新たに列せられた神社が臨時祭には全て記載されていないためであるとする説がある。
sen.e: This discrepancy is accounted for by the theory that the administration of "Jimyocho" and "Rinji-sai" listings was different, or by the theory that shrines that were newly classified as Myojin Taisha were not all added to the Rinji-sai list.

This discrepancy is accounted for by the theory that the administration of "Jimyocho" and "Rinji-sai" listings was different, or by the theory that shrines that were newly classified as Myojin Taisha were not all added to the Rinji-sai list.

This discrepancy is accounted for by the theory that the administration of "Jimyocho" and "Rinji-sai" listings was different, or by the theory that shrines that were newly classified as Myojin Taisha were not all added to the Rinji-sai list.

sen.j: 「神名帳」は『延喜式』巻八・九「神名帳」記載の社名。
sen.e: The 'Jinmyocho' column gives the name listed in the 'Jinmyocho' volumes 8 and 9 of "Engishiki".
The 'Jinmyocho' column gives the name listed in the 'Jinmyocho' volumes 8 and 9 of "Engishiki".
The 'Jinmyocho' column gives the name listed in the 'Jinmyocho' volumes 8 and 9 of "Engishiki."

sen.j: 「臨時祭」は巻三「臨時祭」で名神祭に預る神社として記載されている社名。
sen.e: The 'Rinji-sai' column gives the name given in the "Rinji-sai" volume 2 which lists shrines at which special festivals were held.
The 'Rinji-sai' column gives the name given in the "Rinji-sai" volume 2 which lists shrines at which special festivals were held.
The 'Rinji-sai' column gives the name given in the "Rinji-sai" volume 3 which lists shrines at which special festivals were held.

sen.j: 括弧内は座数で、一座の場合は省略した。
sen.e: The number in brackets indicates the number of enshrined deities and is omitted when only a single deity is enshrined.
The number in brackets indicates the number of enshrined deities and is omitted when only a single deity is enshrined.
The number in brackets indicates the number of enshrined deities and is omitted when only a single deity is enshrined.

sen.j: 比定社は有力な論社を挙げた。
sen.e: The most likely shrines are given where multiple possible modern shrines are theorized as being descended from a listed shrine.
The most likely shrines are given where multiple possible modern shrines are theorized as being descended from a listed shrine.
The most likely shrines are given where multiple possible modern shrines are theorized as being descended from a listed shrine.
